properties.name: _Missouri Territory
properties.note:
Missouri Territory (1819-07-04)

1819/07/04 -> 1821/08/09

The United States created Arkansas Territory from that part of Missouri Territory south of the parallel of 36 degrees, 30 minutes north latitude.

(U.S. Stat., vol. 3, ch. 49[1819]/pp. 493-496)
